activities: Mashable uses personal information that it receives from the EU and Switzerland primarily for marketing services and products to our customers. Such marketing activities include displaying online ads, newsletters, conducting contests, competitions or sweepstakes and e-commerce activities. Mashable may collect personal information of individuals who work for the company, solely for business operations purposes, including those required by governmental agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
